description:
OpenAI has unveiled “Structured Outputs”, a new API feature designed to address the long-standing challenge of reliably generating structured data from large language models (LLMs). The feature, available now, guarantees that model-generated outputs will adhere to developer-defined JSON Schemas. Generating structured data from unstructured input is a cornerstone of many AI applications today. Developers leverage... Read more »

The post OpenAI cures structured data headache for developers appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: OpenAI cures structured data headache for developers
